title: We Played Hide-and-Seek with the Spirits in the Cemetary
itunes:title: We Played Hide-and-Seek with the Spirits in the Cemetary

description:
I see you...

***

Written by Michael Maxim and narrated by Megan McDuffee

Check out our reward tiers at patreon.com/creepypod
